summary.span: 实现 [Microsoft XPath 扩展函数](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143943)。

span.span: Implements the [Microsoft XPath extension function](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143943).

returns.span: 一个包含日期/时间信息的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains date/time information.

returns.span: 如果字符串无法解释为与日期/时间有关的有效 XSD 格式，则返回空字符串。

span.span: If a string cannot be interpreted as a valid XSD date/time-related format, it returns an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将与日期/时间有关的值转换为协调通用时间，并转换为固定 (标准化) 表示形式，该表示形式可以进行按字典顺序排序和比较。Converts date/time-related values into Coordinated Universal Time and into a fixed (normalized) representation that can be sorted and compared lexicographically.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `arg`通过将) (子字符串中的字符替换为 `mapString` 另一个字符串 () 中的字符来转换字符串 () `tranString` 。Converts a string (`arg`) by replacing the characters in a substring (`mapString`) with the characters in another string (`tranString`).
